data.name: Bob
data.text: The short answer to this question would be the entire US education system being completely different for those in different social classes. The long answer would be the class struggle that Americans face in their current government structure, the “American dream” isn’t dead but is far from possible. Look into their culture and their history to gain a better insight into the problem. Feel free to discuss below.

data.name: Alice
data.text: While it’s anti-science, it does respect everyone’s freedom, including the freedom of being anti-sci

post.text: I admired the US a lot when I was young, but over the years I saw a completely different America. Like a rogue country, it is unreasonable, overbearing, and the President lies blatantly. It is anti-science when facing a catastrophe. How could it be like this?
